definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
Tianjin, a municipality in northeast China, abbr. 津
land under heaven/the whole world/the whole of China/realm/rule

sentences.english: Oh dear, I'd been looking forward to warmer weather here.
sentences.chinese: 噢天啊，我原期望這兒會有較暖和的天氣。

sentences.english: The torch will travel the length of Britain during its 70-day relay.
sentences.chinese: 火炬傳遞將在英國國內進行，持續70天。

sentences.english: The salt pans at Maras, in use since pre-Inca days.
sentences.chinese: 在馬拉什的鹽田，在自前印加天使用。

sentences.english: Song Di affirmative answer, let Tian Hongle on the day.
sentences.chinese: 宋迪之的肯定回答，讓田宏樂上了天。

sentences.english: I did 30-day trials both with the macrobiotic diet and with the raw foods diet.
sentences.chinese: 我試驗了30天的長壽飲食和生食飲食。

sentences.english: Median duration of caspofungin treatment was 24 days.
sentences.chinese: 卡泊芬淨中位治療時間爲24天。

sentences.english: A powerful personal growth tool is the 30-day trial.
sentences.chinese: 有一種個人成長的有效工具，叫做“30天試驗”。

sentences.english: The 3-day conference will be held as usual in parallel with the PCIM Exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 像往常一樣3天的會議將與PCIM展會一起進行。

sentences.english: They looked at long-term sick leave (of over 90 days) and hospital admission rates.
sentences.chinese: 他們關注的重點是超過90天的長時間病假和住院率。

sentences.english: What do people do in these days?
sentences.chinese: 人們在這些天都幹什麼呢？

sentences.english: You ought to know better than to go out without an overcoat on such a cold day.
sentences.chinese: 你應當懂得這樣冷的天不穿大衣出去可不行。

sentences.english: Well, you're not coming empty-handed, are you?
sentences.chinese: 天啊，你總不會空着手來，是吧。

sentences.english: The warning is based on the latest 5-day weather forecasts.
sentences.chinese: 這項警報是以今後5天的天氣預報資料爲基礎的。

sentences.english: The dormancy of seed of M. robusta is broke if stratified for 80 days.
sentences.chinese: 低溫層積80天即可解除八棱海棠種子休眠。

sentences.english: Hezbollah fought a 34-day war with Israel in 2006.
sentences.chinese: 真主黨在2006年的時候跟以色列交火34天。

definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
one week/all the way around/a whole cycle
Tin Hau, Empress of Heaven, another name for the goddess Matsu 媽祖|妈祖[Ma1 zu3]/Tin Hau (Hong Kong area around the MTR station with same name)
